thread.title: French man wants $48 million from Uber for allegedly breaking up his marriage
thread.title_full: French man wants $48 million from Uber for allegedly breaking up his marriage

author: Chris Smith
title: French man wants $48 million from Uber for allegedly breaking up his marriage
text:
A French businessman from Côte d'Azur has sued Uber, asking for no less €45 million in damages, or around US$48 million. The reason is mildly amusing, unless of course you’re the man who filed the lawsuit: He claims Uber was the cause of his divorce. 
Continue reading...

Not even T-Mobile can touch the new deal Sprint just announced Sling TV is free all weekend long Apple’s completely redesigned 2017 iPad lineup may hit stores next month
